name: U.S. Minor Outlying Islands
introduction: The United States Minor Outlying IslandsThe minor outlying islands and groups of islands consist of eight United States insular areas in the Pacific Ocean (Baker Island Howland Island Jarvis Island Johnston Atoll Kingman Reef Midway Atoll Palmyra Atoll and Wake Island) and one in the Caribbean Sea (Navassa Island).
overview: The United States Minor Outlying IslandsThe minor outlying islands and groups of islands consist of eight United States insular areas in the Pacific Ocean (Baker Island Howland Island Jarvis Island Johnston Atoll Kingman Reef Midway Atoll Palmyra Atoll and Wake Island) and one in the Caribbean Sea (Navassa Island).
